body:
Adds support for CMake. CMake support is still considered somewhat experimental, but should be usable for embedding protovalidate-cc into projects. For more information about how to use protovalidate with CMake, check the [README information](https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/tree/main/cmake#readme).

Bazel 8 is now also supported, but it requires `WORKSPACE` mode to be enabled. We're interested in getting Bzlmod support as soon as possible, but we're waiting for our dependencies to add Bzlmod support right now.

## What's Changed
* Update Buf logo in README by @smallsamantha in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/65
* Update CEL to v0.10.0, update intertwined dependencies by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/67
* Support Bazel 8, sans bzlmod by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/68
* Remove support for deprecated options by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/69
* Implement shared dependencies system by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/70
* CMake support by @jchadwick-buf in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/72

## New Contributors
* @smallsamantha made their first contribution in https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/pull/65

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bufbuild/protovalidate-cc/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0
name: v0.5.0
